short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send Whatsapp Message to a single user or to users in sum

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Expand your business to reach your customers on WhatsApp, and maintain business continuity.

Short Description:
Download and save your list contacts from groups, filter non-WhatsApp numbers, and Send messages using excel sheet list numbers, download group contacts, delivery reports in excel, filter numbers & more...

Wablue Top Features:
1. Send messages easily.
2. Add custom delay time after each message.
3. Send image, audio, video file attachments.
4. Filter WhatsApp numbers & country.
5. Give contacts an option to unsubscribe.
6. No software installation needed, just a simple chrome extension.
7. Download unsaved contacts from groups, broadcast lists, and more.
8. Connect with customers without saving numbers 
9. Download, export, and save all contacts list.
10. Send links redirecting people to your website, shop. 
11.Give your customers an option to purchase directly from your shop.
12. Upload an excel sheet of your customers and send messages to any country.
13. Send Unsubscribe option with every message so that people who don’t want to receive messages from you can safely opt-out.
14. Download delivery reports and detailed analytics of all the messages that you’ve sent to your customers on WhatsApp.

Clarification:
We do not support Bulk messaging and anything which is against the policies of WhatsApp Inc. Kindly do not use for SPAMMING or BULK Marketing which are strictly prohibited. This software is developed only for personal use / official business usage and not for any kind of bulk messaging.

Disclaimer:
This Chrome plugin is not endorsed or certified WhatsApp Inc.
This is an unofficial enhancement tool for WhatsApp Web.
This software is not to be used against policies of WhatsApp Inc in any manner.
